instructions: The GM will need to make a rollable table. Look for the help link bellow or the "?" on top of the weapon section for detailed instructions. Due to the nature of 2d20 system, it is recommanded to rollover the results of any test to check for any critical successes, complications and DSI rolled. [Changelog](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/mutant_cronicles_3/CHANGELOG.md) [Help](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/mutant_cronicles_3/HELP.md)
